name: i18n-translation-manager-sample
description: Sample project demonstrating i18n Translation Manager features

scripts.translate:server: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/sample-project && node ../../dist/cli.js server
scripts.translate:status: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/sample-project && node ../../dist/cli.js status
scripts.translate:sync: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/sample-project && node ../../dist/cli.js sync
scripts.translate:add-spanish: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/sample-project && node ../../dist/cli.js add-language en es
scripts.translate:add-french: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/sample-project && node ../../dist/cli.js add-language en fr
scripts.translate:add-german: cd ../.. && npm run build && cd examples/sample-project && node ../../dist/cli.js add-language en de

author: i18n Translation Manager
